teamManagement.description: Streamlined hiring process with position management, applicant tracking, candidates database AI analyze and detailed analytics dashboard.

app.title: Workplace Well-Being Assessment
app.subtitle: for {{companyName}}
app.description: Take a few minutes to evaluate your happiness and professional well-being. This assessment is 100% anonymous and confidential.
app.noPersonalData: No personal data is collected ‚Ä¢ Only anonymous aggregated results
app.resultsIncluded: ‚Ä¢ Results will be included in {{companyName}}'s wellness insights
app.confidentiality: üí¨ Confidential and anonymous conversation ‚Ä¢ Your data is not stored personally
app.aggregate: ‚Ä¢ Aggregate insights help improve {{companyName}}'s workplace wellness

welcome.default: Hello! üòä I'm here to help you assess your workplace well-being. This evaluation is completely anonymous and confidential. We'll discuss various aspects of your work life for a few minutes. Are you ready to start?
welcome.company: Hello! üòä I'm here to help you assess your workplace well-being at {{companyName}}. This evaluation is completely anonymous and confidential. We'll discuss various aspects of your work life for a few minutes. Are you ready to start?

progress.title: Happy Check Progress
progress.permaIntro: PERMA scores will appear as you progress through the assessment

completion.complete: Your workplace well-being assessment is now complete.
completion.excellent: Fantastic! Your workplace well-being is shining positively. Keep cultivating this great energy! üåü
completion.good: Very good! You have solid foundations for your professional well-being. A few tweaks can make you shine even more! ‚ú®
completion.improvable: Your situation has good potential for improvement. The tips below will help you reach new heights! üöÄ
completion.poor: Thank you for your honesty. Your answers show real challenges, but remember that everything can improve with the right strategies and support. üíô
completion.adviceIntro: Based on your well-being profile, here are 3 tailored tips to help you thrive:
completion.privacyNote: Privacy: Your responses are fully anonymous and help improve overall workplace well-being.

footer.operatedBy: Operated by Saussez Gr√©gory, Budapest, Hungary
footer.aiDisclaimer: AI features are for demonstration purposes only and should not be used for real HR decisions.

privacyDemo.title: Privacy Notice (Demo Version)
privacyDemo.intro: This demo application is operated by Saussez Gr√©gory (Budapest, Hungary). The purpose of the demo is to test InnoHR‚Äôs features and collect feedback. No commercial activity is conducted, and the service is free of charge.

items.0: Information you voluntarily provide (e.g. name, email, feedback, or test data). Please avoid entering any real or sensitive personal information.
items.1: Technical data (such as browser type, IP address, and approximate geographic region) used for performance and security analysis.

purpose.title: Purpose of Data Processing
purpose.text: The data is used solely to evaluate the usability of the demo, ensure system security, and improve future development of InnoHR.

storage.title: Data Storage and Retention
storage.text: All demo data is automatically deleted every night as part of a scheduled cleanup process. Only minimal technical logs may be stored for up to 90 days for security and debugging purposes.

aiProcessing.title: AI Processing
aiProcessing.text: Some demo features use AI-generated responses (via OpenRouter or OpenAI APIs). These responses are for demonstration purposes only and must not be used for decision-making or employment assessments.

thirdParty.title: Third-Party Services

supabase.name: Supabase (BaaS Platform)
supabase.desc: Purpose: Database hosting and authentication. Headquarters: USA (using EU-based servers).

openai.name: OpenRouter / OpenAI (AI Service)
openai.desc: Purpose: AI-based analysis and responses. Headquarters: USA. Data is not stored long-term.

vercel.name: Vercel (Hosting)
vercel.desc: Purpose: Web hosting and content delivery. Headquarters: USA (EU region enabled).

stripe.name: Stripe (Payment Service)
stripe.desc: Purpose: Payment processing. Currently disabled in the demo version. Headquarters: USA (EU data storage).

resend.name: Resend / Nodemailer (Email Delivery)
resend.desc: Purpose: Sending internal notification emails to the developer. No external marketing messages are sent.

thirdParty.noticeText: Some data may be transferred outside the European Union. Standard Contractual Clauses (SCCs) are used to ensure adequate protection of personal data.

userRights.title: Your Rights
userRights.text: You may request access to or deletion of your data at any time by contacting privacy@innohr.hu. You also have the right to lodge a complaint with the Hungarian National Authority for Data Protection and Freedom of Information (NAIH) at www.naih.hu.

cookies.title: Cookies & Data
cookies.text: We use cookies to improve the demo experience. No tracking or third-party marketing cookies are used.

demoFeatures.title: 1. Demo Version Characteristics
demoFeatures.content: This is a free demo version for testing purposes. System features are limited, and data will be automatically deleted after 30 days.

liability.title: 2. Disclaimer of Liability
liability.content: The demo version is provided "as is" without any warranties. Do not use real personal data or sensitive information.

dataProcessing.title: 3. Data Processing
dataProcessing.content: Data provided during demo usage is used solely for system testing purposes.

aiContent.title: 4. AI Content
aiContent.content: Content generated by AI does not constitute professional advice. Inaccuracies may occur.

termination.title: 5. Access Termination
termination.content: We reserve the right to immediately terminate demo access without notice.

demoBanner.title: Demo version:
demoBanner.text: Do not use real personal data. All demo data is automatically deleted every night.

impressumDemo.title: Impressum
impressumDemo.intro: In accordance with EU law, the following legal information applies to this website and demo.

liability.title: Disclaimer of Liability
liability.text: Despite careful content control, we assume no liability for the content of external links. The operators of linked pages are solely responsible for their content.

copyright.title: Copyright Notice
copyright.text: All texts, images, and source code are protected by copyright. Any reproduction or use outside the limits of copyright law requires prior written consent.

cookiesDemo.title: Cookie Notice (Demo Version)
cookiesDemo.intro: This demo application uses minimal cookies and similar technologies to ensure its proper functioning and measure technical performance. No advertising or tracking cookies are used.

whatAreCookies.title: What Are Cookies?
whatAreCookies.text: Cookies are small text files stored on your device when you visit a website. They help websites function properly, remember your preferences, and gather anonymous usage statistics.

howWeUse.title: How We Use Cookies
howWeUse.text: We only use essential cookies that are necessary for authentication and security (via Supabase) and technical analytics (via Vercel). These cookies do not identify you personally and are deleted automatically after your session ends.

items.necessary: Necessary cookies ‚Äì required for login, session management, and security.
items.analytics: Analytics cookies ‚Äì used to monitor technical performance through Vercel Analytics. No personal tracking.
items.functional: Functional cookies ‚Äì used temporarily to remember your demo language and consent preferences.

manage.title: Managing Cookies
manage.text: You can manage or delete cookies through your browser settings. Since this is a demo environment, disabling cookies may prevent some features (e.g., login or language settings) from functioning properly.

moreInfo.title: More Information
moreInfo.text: If you have any questions about this Cookie Notice, please contact us at
